parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: ProfileIds
parameters.description: List of unique identifiers for customer profiles to retrieve. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: For information about the errors that are common to all actions, see Common Errors.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: Status code for why a specific profile failed.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Message describing why a specific profile failed.

nested_items.name: ProfileId
nested_items.description: The profile id that failed.

nested_items.name: Profiles
nested_items.description: Array of Profile Objects.

nested_items.name: ProfileId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of a customer profile.

nested_items.description: An account number that you have given to the customer.

nested_items.description: Any additional information relevant to the customer's profile.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: A key value pair of attributes of a customer profile.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FoundByItems
nested_items.description: A list of items used to find a profile returned in a SearchProfiles response. An item is a key-value(s) pair that matches an attribute in the profile.

AND - The profile included in the response matched all of the search keys specified in the request. The FoundByItems will include all of the key-value(s) pairs that were specified in the request (as this is a requirement of AND search logic).
OR - The profile included in the response matched at least one of the search keys specified in the request. The FoundByItems will include each of the key-value(s) pairs that the profile was found by.

nested_items.name: PartyTypeString
nested_items.description: An alternative to PartyType which accepts any string as input.

nested_items.name: GenderString
nested_items.description: An alternative to Gender which accepts any string as input.
